name: gcloud-test
description: a simple app to test deployments and resource integrations on google cloud app-engine

scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && node src/scripts/build.js
scripts.postbuild: rm -rf post-build && mkdir post-build && node src/scripts/post_build.js
scripts.gcp-build: rm -rf gcp-build && mkdir gcp-build && node src/scripts/gcp_build.js
